title: Dropped But Not Forgotten | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Dropped But Not Forgotten | Joel Osteen
description:
Moments of disappointment may come, but they can't keep you from your destiny. God wants to restore everything that has been lost in your life.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
